title: Masala Dosa
steps: Soak rice, urad dal, and fenugreek overnight.
Grind into a smooth batter and ferment overnight.
Cook dosa on a hot pan.
Prepare potato filling with onions, turmeric, and boiled potatoes.
Serve dosa stuffed with masala filling.

title: Idli Sambar
steps: Steam the idlis using fermented batter.
Cook toor dal with turmeric until soft.
Add onions, tomatoes, tamarind pulp, and sambar powder.
Simmer well and serve hot with idlis.

title: Lemon Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.
Add urad dal, chana dal, green chilies, and curry leaves.
Mix in turmeric and salt.
Add lemon juice and cooked rice.
Toss well and serve.

title: Tamarind Rice
steps: Heat oil and add mustard seeds, red chilies, urad dal, and chana dal.
Add curry leaves and tamarind extract.
Cook until the raw smell goes away.
Mix with cooked rice and serve.

title: Vegetable Upma
steps: Roast rava until lightly golden and set aside.
Heat oil, add mustard seeds, urad dal, chana dal, and curry leaves.
Add onions, carrots, beans, and green chili. Sauté well.
Pour in water and add salt.
Slowly add roasted rava while stirring to avoid lumps.
Cook until soft and serve hot.

title: Pongal
steps: Cook rice and moong dal together until soft.
Heat ghee, fry cashew nuts until golden, then add ginger, cumin, and black pepper.
Mix seasoning into cooked pongal.
Serve hot with coconut chutney or sambar.

title: Rasam Rice
steps: Boil tamarind water with tomatoes, garlic, turmeric, and rasam powder.
Temper mustard seeds and curry leaves in oil and add to rasam.
Mix rasam with rice.
Serve hot.

title: Tomato Rice
steps: Heat oil and add mustard seeds and curry leaves.
Add onions, green chilies, and ginger-garlic paste. Sauté well.
Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, and garam masala. Cook until soft.
Mix with cooked rice and serve hot.

title: Coconut Rice
steps: Heat oil in a pan and add mustard seeds.
Once they splutter, add urad dal, chana dal, green chilies, and curry leaves.
Add grated coconut and sauté lightly.
Mix with cooked rice and add salt to taste.
Serve with pickle or curry.

title: Chettinad Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste and tomatoes, cook until soft.
Add turmeric and Chettinad masala powder, fry well.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Pour coconut milk, cover, and cook until chicken is tender.
Serve hot with rice or roti.

title: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until half cooked.
Heat butter, sauté onions and ginger-garlic paste.
Add tomato puree and spices, cook until oil separates.
Add chicken and cream, simmer until fully cooked.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Fry paneer cubes lightly and set aside.
In butter, sauté onions and add tomato puree.
Add spices and cook until oil separates.
Stir in cream and paneer cubes.
Simmer for 5 minutes and serve hot.

title: Chole Bhature
steps: Pressure cook chickpeas until soft.
Sauté onions and tomatoes with spices.
Add chickpeas and simmer until gravy thickens.
Knead flour with yogurt, rest for 30 min.
Roll and deep-fry bhature until golden.

title: Rajma Chawal
steps: Boil rajma (kidney beans) until soft.
Cook onions, tomatoes, and spices into a gravy.
Add rajma to the gravy and simmer for 15 minutes.
Cook rice separately.
Serve hot rajma with rice.

title: Aloo Paratha
steps: Knead dough with wheat flour and water.
Mix mashed potatoes with spices and coriander.
Roll dough, stuff with potato filling, and seal.
Roll again gently into paratha shape.
Cook on tawa with ghee until golden.
